citations.narrative:
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on14-NOV-17 at 10:20 am.
Dr. Neafsey and I arrived at the facility at approximately 10:20 am. We were informed by the people at the front
desk that no one was available to accompany us for the inspection at that time. I provided my card and we left the
facility.
Additional Inspectors
Neafsey Michael, Assistant Director

narrative:
